channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: sports
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: sports

item.title: Texas QB Arch Manning available to play against No. 9 Vanderbilt after clearing concussion protocol
item.description: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Texas quarterback Arch Manning is available to play for the No. 20 Longhorns on Saturday against No. 9 Vanderbilt after clearing concussion protocol. Manning was not listed on Texas' injury report filed Friday night with the Southeastern Conference.
item.dc:creator: JIM VERTUNO, Associated Press, PHL 17

item.title: Jazz get burned by the Suns, 118-96
item.description: PHOENIX (ABC4 Sports) - The Utah Jazz fell in an early hole they could not climb out of in a 118-96 loss to the Phoenix Suns Friday night.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Police investigating break-in at home reported to belong to NBA star Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
item.description: Police on Friday were investigating a burglary at a home reported to belong to the Oklahoma City Thunder’s Shai Gilgeous-Alexander that happened while the NBA's reigning MVP was playing a game the night before.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, Fox 5

item.title: Gervonta 'Tank' Davis hit with civil suit over domestic allegations at strip club weeks before Jake Paul fight
item.description: Gervonta "Tank" Davis faces a civil lawsuit from ex-girlfriend Courtney Rossel alleging assault at her workplace, just weeks before his exhibition fight against Jake Paul.
item.dc:creator: Fox News

item.title: ESPN, ABC and other Disney services pulled from YouTube TV
item.description: The dispute between the two media giants centers on the price YouTube TV pays Disney for access to its content.
item.dc:creator: Meg Hilling, NewsNation

item.title: Lamar Jackson torches Miami with 4 TD passes in return from injury and Ravens rout Dolphins 28-6
item.description: MIAMI GARDENS, Fla. (AP) — Lamar Jackson returned for the Baltimore Ravens, and so did the chants of “M-V-P!” — on the road. Jackson threw for 204 yards and four touchdowns, showing little rust in his return from a right hamstring strain, and the Ravens routed the Miami Dolphins 28-6.
item.dc:creator: ALANIS THAMES, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: Thunder guard Nikola Topic diagnosed with testicular cancer and undergoing chemotherapy
item.description: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — Oklahoma City Thunder guard Nikola Topic has been diagnosed with testicular cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. Sam Presti, the team's general manager, announced the diagnosis on Thursday. Topic had a testicular procedure earlier in the month.
item.dc:creator: CLIFF BRUNT, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: Logan Cooley signs 8-year, $80-million extension
item.description: The Utah Mammoth announced that center, Logan Cooley, will be signing an eight-year contract extension with the team.
item.dc:creator: Ava Hart, ABC 4

item.title: Snowbasin named #3 ski resort in the West
item.description: HUNTSVILLE, Utah (ABC4 Sports) - Snowbasin Resort has once again been recognized among North America’s best, earning the No. 3 spot in SKI Magazine’s “Top 30 Resorts in the West” for 2026.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Guerrero homers off Ohtani as Blue Jays even World Series with 6-2 win over Dodgers in Game 4
item.description: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit a two-run homer off Shohei Ohtani in the third inning, Shane Bieber pitched four-hit ball into the sixth, and the Toronto Blue Jays got back on track with a 6-2 victory over the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 4 of the World Series on Tuesday night at Dodger Stadium.
item.dc:creator: GREG BEACHAM, Associated Press, WGN 9

item.title: Mobster denied bail as Billups, Rozier await arraignment amid FBI probe
item.description: A member of the notorious Gambino crime family, Angelo Ruggiero Jr. has been denied bail and remains in custody.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Djordjevic, NewsNation

item.title: Americans divided along party lines over Bad Bunny Super Bowl appearance: poll
item.description: (KRON) -- Americans are divided along political party lines over the NFL's decision to book Bad Bunny for this year's Super Bowl Halftime Show. That's according to a new Quinnipiac University Poll.
item.dc:creator: Alex Baker, KRON4

item.title: Former NFL center Nick Mangold dies shortly after sharing he needed kidney transplant
item.description: His death comes less than two weeks after the two-time All-Pro selection announced on social media that he had kidney disease and needed a transplant.
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press, WFLA, NBC

item.title: SDFC to host sellout crowd at Snapdragon for first-ever playoff match: How to watch
item.description: San Diego FC will host the Portland Timbers at Snapdragon Stadium on Sunday for Game 1 of Round 1 of the 2025 MLS Cup Playoffs, with tickets sold out and fans able to watch or listen from home or at local bars and restaurants.
item.dc:creator: Sharisse Cohee, Fox 5

item.title: Bears vs. Ravens: Injuries, inactives and key matchups for Sunday's game in Baltimore
item.description: Sometimes, the major headline leading into an NFL game is up for debate. Other times, it's obvious. This would be a case of the latter. The big news for Sunday's Bears vs.
item.dc:creator: Michael Johnson, WGN 9

item.title: Utes trounce Colorado behind Ficklin's career night, 53-7
item.description: SALT LAKE CITY (ABC4 Sports) - Byrd is the word. Freshman Byrd Ficklin passed for two touchdowns and ran for another in his first career start to lead Utah to a 53-7 win over Colorado on Saturday night.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Cooley scores twice as Mammoth win sixth straight, 6-2
item.description: ST. PAUL, Minn. (ABC4 Sports) - Logan Cooley scored twice in the first 3:29, Nick Schmaltz also had two goals and the Utah Mammoth won their sixth straight game, beating the Minnesota Wild 6-2 on Saturday night. Two days after scoring a first-period hat trick at St.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4

item.title: Kucherov gets 1,000th career point in Lightning's game against Ducks
item.description: TAMPA, Fla. (AP) — Nikita Kucherov became the third-fastest active player to reach the 1,000-point club, reaching the milestone Saturday in the Tampa Bay Lightning's 4-3 win against the Anaheim Ducks. Kucherov finished with two assists and reached milestone in his 809th career game.
item.dc:creator: ERIK ERLENDSSON, Associated Press, Fox 5

item.title: BYU keeps rolling with 41-27 win at Iowa State
item.description: AMES, Iowa (ABC4 Sports) - There was no letdown after the rivalry game this time. Bear Bachmeier threw for 307 yards and two touchdowns, both to Parker Kingston, as the 11th-ranked Cougars came from 14 points down to beat Iowa State Saturday afternoon, 41-27.
item.dc:creator: Dana Greene, ABC 4
